title: Strengthening Customer Experience Competencies: Constructivist ICT Collaborative Learning System for Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more mathematical problem-solving strategies in a computer-supported collaborative learning environment based on constructivist principles.
Learners can establish and execute self-directed mathematics learning plans using CD-ROM-based multimedia materials and online platforms.
Learners can complete mathematical collaborative tasks using ICT tools in small team projects, thereby enhancing their digital communication skills.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
